actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.
Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: A bill to prohibit the appropriation and expenditure of unvouchered funds (except in the case of intelligence agencies) unless specifically authorized by law, and to provide for reports on and audits of authorized expenditures of unvouchered funds.

summary.text: Unvouchered Expenditure Control Act - Prohibits the expenditure of Federal moneys, not otherwise provided for by law, which are not made pursuant to procedures providing for a voucher describing the payee and items or services for which payment is being made. Requires all appropriations, not made under a law which provides otherwise, to provide for voucher requirements for expending such moneys appropriated. Requires the Comptroller General to audit all programs subject to this Act.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit the appropriation and expenditure of unvouchered funds (except in the case of intelligence agencies) unless specifically authorized by law, and to provide for reports on and audits of authorized expenditures of unvouchered funds.
